definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
Agincourt (near Arras in north France, scene of a battle in 1415)

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare, is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至懷疑現代福利院，是民政部門的小金庫。

sentences.english: I can’t endure the leisured man’s measures for the treasures in the treasury.
sentences.chinese: 我不能容忍那個悠閒男子對金庫財寶採取的措施。

sentences.english: It's a habit you might want to consider in order to build up your own little storehouse of cash.
sentences.chinese: 你可以借鑑這個習慣，建立一個自己的小金庫。

sentences.english: Treasury in a box too much, difficult to find out the printing plate hiding place.
sentences.chinese: 金庫中箱子太多，難以找出印版的藏匿處。

sentences.english: The leisured man took no measure for the treasure in the treasury.
sentences.chinese: 那個悠閒的男子對金庫裏的財寶沒有采取措施。

sentences.english: A light purse is a heavy curse .
sentences.chinese: 小金庫好比一個巨大的詛咒。

sentences.english: We deliver the money in mass or in instalments to the treasury.
sentences.chinese: 我們把錢整毛或分批送交金庫。

sentences.english: Dumbledore's high security vault was number 713.
sentences.chinese: 鄧布利多的防範嚴密的金庫是713號。

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有人懷疑，現代福利，是民政部門的小金庫。

sentences.english: It'll be a mini-Fort Knox, impossible to open.'
sentences.chinese: 它就像一個迷你的諾克斯堡金庫，根本不可能打開。

sentences.english: The "departmental coffer" is a hotbed of corruption.
sentences.chinese: “小金庫”是當前滋生腐敗現象的溫牀。

sentences.english: Why did they steal so much money anyway?
sentences.chinese: 他們究竟爲什麼從金庫裏偷那麼多錢？

sentences.english: The"small coffer", which has disturbed seriously the order of the financial activities, is very dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 小金庫”嚴重擾亂了財務活動秩序，危害極大。

sentences.english: Did the ancients have exchequers or safes?
sentences.chinese: 古人有金庫或保險箱嗎？

sentences.english: Cases involving off-books accounts and arbitrary spending in violation of regulations will be investigated and dealt with severely.
sentences.chinese: 嚴厲查處設立小金庫和各種違反規定亂花錢的行爲。

definition: to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement
you can net sparrows at the door (idiom); completely deserted
a store room for books/fig. an erudite person/the Bibliotheca and Epitome of pseudo-Apollodorus
a legendary tree that sheds coins when shaken/a source of easy money (idiom)
